sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Makes cert_audit table extensible.</description>
        <name>MakeCertAuditTableExtensible</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(
    function() {
        var source = 'MakeCertAuditTableExtensible';
        var sysDBObjectGr = new GlideRecord("sys_db_object");
        if (!sysDBObjectGr.get("name", "cert_audit")) {
            gs.logError(source + ': cert_audit not found in sys_db_object.', source);
            return;
        }

        sysDBObjectGr.setValue("is_extendable", true);
        if (sysDBObjectGr.update()) {
            gs.log(source + ': Update sys_db_object successful, set is_extendable to true.', source);
        } else {
            gs.logError(source + ': Updating sys_db_object trying to set is_extendable to true.', source);
        }
    })();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-02-23 03:20:16</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>78f0427cb7e2a010ef2aca5dde11a9c6</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MakeCertAuditTableExtensible</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Certification Core" source="com.snc.certification_core">df36b0a03cb1311068bcf327dfe37f99</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_78f0427cb7e2a010ef2aca5dde11a9c6</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-03-03 19:36:45</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
